snippet.title: Danger Crew Trailer
snippet.description:
Danger Crew is a turn based, single player RPG set in the world of programming and hackers. 
Available Now on PC, Mac, and Linux!

Danger Crew on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1064690/Danger_Crew

Join our Discord:
https://discord.gg/umD2GRy

Join our Email List:
https://us13.list-manage.com/subscribe?u=467755aba42db48795fa86c95&id=b40db07f16

*** Danger Crew ***

Bust out your laptop in hack battles against other programmers!

Level up your Crew with new scripts, laptop upgrades, and computer science themed items!

Complete journal quests by helping people at the office and in the city solve big problems!

A full 7 chapter single player story experience!

Original soundtrack created by the developers and friends!
